sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: も means "also" or "too" - indicates something additional or similar.

children.heading: 1. Also/Too (Affirmative)
children.content: 私も学生です "I'm also a student" これも好きです "I like this too" 日本語も勉強します "I also study Japanese"

children.heading: 2. Neither/Either (Negative)
children.content: 私も行きません "I won't go either" これも分かりません "I don't understand this either"

children.heading: 3. Emphasis with Numbers
children.content:
"As many/much as":

3つも買った "bought as many as 3" 100人も来た "as many as 100 people came" 10時間も待った "waited as long as 10 hours"

children.heading: 4. Both... and... (A も B も)
children.content: 犬も猫も好き "like both dogs and cats" 日本語も英語も話せる "can speak both Japanese and English"

sections.heading: Replaces Other Particles
sections.content:
も replaces は, が, を:

私は → 私も (I also) 本が → 本も (book also) 水を → 水も (water also)

But not に, で, へ (combines with them):

学校にも行く - "also go to school" 図書館でも勉強する - "also study at library"

children.heading: Both... and...
children.content: [A]も[B]も 犬も猫も - "both dogs and cats"

children.heading: Negative
children.content: [Noun]も[Negative verb] 何も食べない - "don't eat anything" 誰も来ない - "nobody comes"

sections.heading: Special Pattern: 〜も〜ない
sections.content:
With question words means "not any":

何も食べない "don't eat anything" 誰も来ない "nobody comes" どこにも行かない "don't go anywhere"

Must use negative verb.

sections.heading: Combining with Other Particles
sections.content: にも - "also to/at" でも - "also at/by" からも - "also from" まで - "even to/until" 学校にも図書館にも行く "go to both school and library"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ "Also/too" in affirmative ✓ "Neither/either" in negative ✓ Emphasis with numbers ✓ Replaces は/が/を ✓ Combines with に/で/から

Related:

Question Words Negative Forms
